mapper.insert: INSERT INTO temp (tmp_pid, tmp_uid, tmp_state, tmp_useful, tmp_unuseful, tmp_update_date, tmp_content, tmp_status) VALUES (#{pid}, #{uid}, #{state}, 0, 0, now(), #{content}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT tmp.*, coalesce(tu.tu_useful, 0) as my_opt FROM tempUser tu RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM temp WHERE tmp_pid = #{pid} AND tmp_update_date > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL '0 00:10:00' DAY_SECOND) ORDER BY tmp_update_date DESC LIMIT 5) tmp ON tu.tu_uid = #{uid} AND tu.tu_tid = tmp.tmp_id
-- 统计10分钟内的拥挤度 -- SELECT * FROM temp WHERE tmp_pid = #{pid} AND tmp_update_date > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL '0 00:10:00' DAY_SECOND)
-- 根据uid分页查询拥挤度状态 -- SELECT tt.*, tp.prk_name FROM temp AS tt INNER JOIN parking AS tp ON tt.tmp_pid = prk_id WHERE tt.tmp_uid = #{uid} ORDER BY tt.tmp_update_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rowCount}
